Posts.EditableText:
In Gamebook mode, in the online creator, is it possible to have this:

Take _____ _____, and _____ me in the _____.


where each of those blanks is a text box the player has to fill in with the correct word,

then once they do, a function can be called; but no function is called until they put the right words in the right boxes?

T.

Posts.EditableText: Perhaps it's possible to do this in any way with hacks but not with the standard features of Quest
